description:
Moco Moco Friends is an exciting
twist on the adventure RPG genre.
Build your skills and amass loads of
cuddly monsters to become the
ultimate Plushkin Master! Battle
against your rivals, scavenge items,
venture through massive dungeons,
evolve your Plushkin monsters, and
travel with your companions across
the magical realm of Dreamtopia!
name: Moco Moco Friends
